about_the_game:
Embark on a dual-world adventure in Tales of the Valente! Follow Bastien, a young boy navigating the challenges of the real world while discovering his inner hero in the fantastical Glowing Forest.

In the real world, Bastien is a scared little kid, but within the Glowing Forest, he becomes the hero of a land filled with mythical creatures, talking animals, magical landscapes, and challenging quests. As Bastien, players will face various fears personified as in-game challenges and obstacles. By utilizing strength, courage, and compassion, help Bastien overcome these fears and learn invaluable life lessons.

Join Bastien on this captivating journey and experience a game that blends adventure, personal growth, and the power of resilience. Tales of the Valente offers a heartwarming and thrilling gameplay experience for players of all ages.

Features:
  • Engaging Storytelling: Immerse yourself in captivating narratives that teach valuable life skills—engaging with Bastiens growth a character.
  • Thrilling Quests: Face thrilling challenges that encourage bravery and resilience.
  • Personified Fears: Face Bastien’s fears brought to life as in-game challenges and obstacles, providing a meaningful and immersive gameplay experience.
  • Dynamic Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game with a dynamic soundtrack that enhances the emotional and adventurous aspects of the story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Transforming play into empowerment, guiding players through magical adventures to conquer fears with courage and compassion. Complete puzzles, races and befriend all different kind of creatures to help Bastien overcome his fears.
